data.name: Barbarous 2 - Tavern Wars
data.detailed_description:
Join Emyr and the Barbarous party again and take on legendary new challenges!

The tavern‚Äôs hum has been interrupted by none other than Paladin McArthus‚Äîa name famous across all lands! Inspired by the successful new career of his former rival Emyr, McArthus is prepared to make Emyr an offer he can‚Äôt refuse. Meanwhile, Gwen realizes there is no escaping family obligations. Will she choose responsibility at the cost of abandoning what captivates her heart?

Emyr soon finds himself caught up in a dishonest game with no clear rules. When it comes to the glory and fame of the greatest tavern in the world, there can be no mercy! Will the power of friendship and the strength of family ties be enough to overcome the adversities that await?

Manage your time and run a tavern, delighting not only your customers, but also the Great Culinary Critic! Enjoy an amazing storyline and exciting gameplay across each of the game's 60 levels.

FEATURES:
üçñ Embark on a fun new adventure with Emyr and the Barbarous party!
üçñ Immerse yourself in an amazing story and make your tavern famous in every corner of the land!
üçñ Customize the game to your liking and choose from three difficulty levels.
üçñ Explore beautiful locations framed by an epic soundtrack.

data.short_description: Join Emyr and the Barbarous party on an epic Time Management adventure!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Language:
- Mild profanity in dialogue scenes between levels (rarely).

Controlled Substance:
- Alcohol (beer/wine) displayed in levels (It's a tavern game!).
